title: inherent assoc tys ICE when underneath a binder

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code ```Rust #![feature(inherent_associated_types)] struct Foo(T); impl<'a> Foo { type Assoc = &'a (); } trait Other {} impl Other for u32 {} fn bar(_: for<'a> fn(Foo::Assoc)) {} ``` ### Meta playground nightly: ``` Nightly channel Build using the Nightly version: 1.70.0-nightly (2023-03-29 17c11672167827b0dd92) ``` ### Error output
Backtrace

``` error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_borrowck/src/universal_regions.rs:905:36: cannot convert `ReErased` to a region vid thread 'rustc' panicked at 'Box', /rustc/17c11672167827b0dd92c88ef69f24346d1286dd/compiler/rustc_errors/src/lib.rs:1644:9 stack backtrace: 0: 0x7f6992043e8a -
